value:
$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|Um, Peony? When this is over...
Can we talk?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|...Yes! Of course! I don't want to
spend all next year fighting with
you! Haven't we fought enough?$k$p$WmMPID_年明プルメリア,ch00_25_Plumeria_F_NewYear21,Face|It gets so steamy fighting in all these
heavy clothes...$k$pLet's make this quick so I can put
on something more comfortable
already, shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_年明フランネル,ch05_50_Flannel_M_NewYear21,Face|We won't lose this time! Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベロア,ch05_48_Velour_F_NewYear21,Face|I'll make my New Year's resolution
to win. Now we can't lose!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ニシキ,ch05_49_Nishiki_M_NewYear21,Face|You messed up my tail, so now
I'm going to mess you up!
This is payback!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|This was the house. Are you sure
you're all right, Peony?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Yep! Just leave it to me! I have the
perfect dream for the two of them!
Hee hee, sweet dreams, you two...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_02,0|$Fi1500|*yawn* ...Huh? Oh. That was all...
just a dream?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|*YAWWWWWN* Good morning!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Good morning to you! You know,
I had the nicest dream last night.$k$pI was a teacher, just like I've always
wanted, and I lived in a cute little
house too.$k$pAnd you lived there with me. We'd
go out and spend our free time
together... Wouldn't that be nice?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Really?! I had that same dream!
It was great! And so fun too...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Huh! Really? Strange...$k$pWell, I guess it's decided then!$k$pI'm going to study hard and make
that dream a reality, so I can keep
living with you and having fun.$k$pI know I can't replace Mom or Dad,
but...would that make you happy?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Yes! That dream made me realize
how much I love my older sister.$k$pI won't cry anymore. I just want to
do whatever I can to help make our
dream come true!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Oh, I'm so glad! As long as I'm with
you, I know I'll be happy. So let's
keep working to be even happier!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_比翼ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_FF_Pair,Face|$Fi1500|Hee hee... It worked out, didn't it!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|"As long as I'm with you, I'll be
happy," she said. Yes, it seems
it worked after all.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Triandra... Being with you makes
me happy too.$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Wh-what? You can't just say things
like that.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Do you feel...differently?$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|...No. Being together with you, well,
it makes me happy too.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ピアニー|Yay! Then let's stick together all
year round!$k$p$nMEID_スカビオサ|Yes. I'd like that. Here's to a new
year, Peony...$k$p$Sbs150|
